title: Stronger You
description: The 'Stronger you' giode focuses on building strength and muscle mass with a specific focus on building the glutes and shoulders. It is an 4 week guide with 5 workouts a week.

exersise.name: Barbell Hip Thrust
exersise.description: Place the bar over your hips, look forward and raise the weights. Your knees should be in a 90 degrees angle at the top of the exercise. Tuck your chin in to your chest during the exerise, look forward, push from your heels

exersise.name: Barbell Sumo Deadlift
exersise.description: You should have a bit wider stance for this exercise compared to regular deadlifts. Remember to not bend your bakc during the exercise, since it may cause injury. Lift with your legs at the bottom of the exercise and stabilize with the back
